description: This source file defines CastOptionsProvider, a class that implements the OptionsProvider interface to provide configuration options for Google Cast framework within an Android application. It primarily supplies the receiver application ID used for casting content and includes a placeholder for customization.

classes.name: CastOptionsProvider
classes.description: Provides Google Cast options, specifically setting the receiver application ID for casting purposes.

methods.name: getCastOptions
methods.description: Returns the CastOptions configuration including the receiver application ID.

methods.name: getAdditionalSessionProviders
methods.description: Returns null indicating no additional session providers are used.
